uvx.description: Hypothetical example using uvx (not currently published this way)

python.description: Run the server directly from source code

examples.prompt: Generate a single UUIDv7 string for me.
I need a UUIDv7 for a new database record.
Can you generate 5 UUIDv7 strings for batch processing?
Create a batch of 10 UUIDv7 identifiers.
I need unique identifiers for my application. Please generate a UUIDv7.

name: @pomazanbohdan/mcp-uuidv7-generator
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for generating UUIDv7 strings.
